application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Replacement of pitched glass roof with solid insulated flat roof of existing extension including skylight and erection of parapet with new hopper and rain water pipe to the rear and side of the house.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2PA_PE01_P00, 2PA_PE02_P00, 2PA_PE03_P00,, 2PA_PE04_P00,, 2PA_PP00_P00,, 2PA_PP03_P00, 2PA_PS01_P00, 2PA_PS02_P00, 2PA_PS03_P00, 2PA_EE01_P00,, 2PA_EE02_P00, 2PA_EE03_P00,, 2PA_EE04_P00,, 2PA_EP00_P00,, 2PA_EP03_P00,, 2PA_ES01_P00,, 2PA_ES02_P00, design & access statement, flood risk assessment Received: 23/11/2022; fire statement Received: 29/11/2022) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
